effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Test Subject's Clasps
description: Don't take 'em off - might need to identify your body.

(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a high chance to grant you a dose of Venomous Potential. At 5 doses, inject them into your target to deal 201,664 Nature damage over 3 sec.

Dealing Nature damage has a chance to grant you an additional dose.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 4,860 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 220,215 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 2,617 Strength and absorbing 1.1 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 76,383 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
